content.text:
# 16th Filmfare Awards South

The 16th Filmfare Awards South Ceremony honoring the winners of the best of South Indian cinema in 1968 was an event held in 1969.
Awards
{| class="wikitable" width=100% |
|-
! !  style="background:#eedd82; text-align:center; width:50%;"|Best Tamil Film
! !  style="background:#eedd82; text-align:center; width:50%;"|Best Telugu Film
|-
| valign="top" |
*Lakshmi Kalyanam - A. L. Srinivasan
| valign="top" |
*Sudigundalu - Akkineni Nageswara Rao  Adurthi Subba Rao
|-
! !  style="background:#eedd82; text-align:center; width:50%;"|Best Malayalam Film
|-
| valign="top" |
*Thulabharam - M/s. Supriya Pictures
|}
References
* Filmfare Magazine 1969.
